p:
Near 286 complete genomes of SARS‐CoV‐2 and related viruses, has been submitted to the GISAID database ( http://www.gisaid.org/CoV2020) collecting genetic information of the outbreak worldwide. The genomic sequences of all SARS‐CoV‐2 viruses isolated from patients share a sequence identity about a 99.9%,
7 suggesting a recently zoonotic infection, originated most probably from bats.
